description: Detects use of chcp to look up the system locale value as part of host discovery
false_positives: During Anaconda update the 'conda.exe' process will eventually launch the command described in the detection section
name: CHCP CodePage Locale Lookup
query: ((process.parent.executable.text:*\\cmd.exe AND process.parent.command_line.text:(*\ \/c\ * OR *\ \/k\ *) AND process.executable.text:*\\chcp.com AND process.command_line.text:(*chcp OR *chcp\  OR *chcp\ \ )) AND (NOT ((GrandparentCommandLine:*\/c\ C\:\\ProgramData\\Anaconda3*))))
author: _pete_0
TheDFIRReport
